nodes.text: Fen slugs were a type of slug. When flying in one of the shuttles of the heavy cruiser Springhawk during a mission in the Rapacc system, the Chiss Mitth'ali'astov considered the shuttle to have manoeuvrability comparable to that of a fen slug.
Fen slugs were first mentioned in the 2020 novel Thrawn Ascendancy: Chaos Rising, which was written by Timothy Zahn.
